title: Adagio Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Adagio adapter

organizationId.description: Id of the Organization. Handed out by Adagio.

placement.description: Refers to the placement of an adunit in a page. Must not contain any information about the type of device.
Refers to the placement of an adunit in a page. See Adagio recommended values: https://prebid.org/dev-docs/bidders/adagio.html#recommended-placement-param-values.

site.description: Name of the site. Handed out by Adagio.

pagetype.description: Describes what kind of content will be present in the page.

category.description: Category of the content displayed in the page.
